meanings.definition: To undermine or discredit the legitimacy or authority of something.
meanings.sent1: Spreading false rumors about the leader delegitimizes his power.
meanings.sent2: Questioning the election results delegitimizes the democratic process.
meanings.sent3: Saying the dog ate your homework delegitimizes your excuse.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring the rules completely delegitimizes the game.
meanings.sent5: The magician's reveal delegitimizes the mystery.

meanings.definition: To make something appear illegitimate or not valid.
meanings.sent1: Forging a signature delegitimizes the document.
meanings.sent2: Using fake credentials delegitimizes your qualifications.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a fake mustache delegitimizes your disguise.
meanings.sent4: Adding fake news delegitimizes the article.
meanings.sent5: The counterfeit money delegitimizes the economy.
